questions:
What is the photo about?
A) A shrub with silver-gray leaves
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A shrub with silver-gray leaves
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A vehicle
C) A plant
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A flower
C) A shrub with silver-gray leaves
D) A rock

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A pathway
B) Soil and some grass
C) A pond
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A body of water
C) Other plants and greenery
D) A building

What is the color of the plant in the center?
A) Green
B) Yellow
C) Silver-gray
D) Red

What is the condition of the soil in the photo?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Dry and mixed with some leaves
C) Covered with snow
D) Sandy and rocky

What is the texture of the plant in the center?
A) Smooth and glossy
B) Rough and fuzzy
C) Spiky and sharp
D) Soft and velvety

How many main plants are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What kind of plant is in the center of the photo?
A) A flowering plant
B) A shrub with intricate leaves
C) A tree
D) A cactus

What is the state of the surrounding vegetation?
A) Lush and green
B) Sparse and dry
C) Covered in snow
D) Burnt and charred

What is the primary color scheme of the photo?
A) Blue and white
B) Green, silver and brown
C) Red and yellow
D) Black and white

What is the texture of the soil in the foreground?
A) Rocky and uneven
B) Smooth and sandy
C) Dry and crumbly
D) Wet and compact

What type of plant is not present in the photo?
A) A flowering plant
B) A shrub with silver-gray leaves
C) A tree
D) A cactus

What is the relationship between the plant in the center and the surrounding plants?
A) They are of the same species
B) They are different species but coexist in the same environment
C) They are artificial plants
D) They are all flowering plants

What is the mood of the photo?
A) Chaotic and busy
B) Calm and serene
C) Dark and gloomy
D) Festive and bright

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye level
C) Close-up
D) Wide-angle

A) Rose
B) Dusty Miller
C) Sunflower
D) Cactus

What is the photo's main subject?
A) An animal

D) A building

B) Low contrast with muted tones
C) Moderate contrast with clear details
D) No contrast, very flat

What is the state of the plant in the center?
A) Blooming
B) Dormant
C) Dead
D) Healthy and growing

What is the angle of the photo?
A) From above looking down
B) From below looking up
C) Straight on at eye level
D) At an angle from the side

What is the relationship between the soil and the plant in the photo?
A) The soil is supporting the plant's growth
B) The soil is eroding
C) The soil is too wet for the plant
D) The soil is too dry for the plant

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Low light
B) Bright sunlight
C) Overcast
D) Artificial light

A) Water
B) Soil
C) Rocks
D) Flowers

B) Trees
C) Plants
D) Buildings

What is the relationship between the light and the plant in the photo?

B) The plant is well-lit by sunlight

A) Tall trees
B) Flowering shrubs and green leafy plants

D) Cacti

B) Unbalanced with a focus on one side

D) Asymmetrical

B) Neatly maintained

C) A beach scene

A) The plant is isolated from the background elements
